wblut.hemesh.creators
Class HEC_IsoFunction

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.creators.HEC_Creator
      wblut.hemesh.creators.HEC_IsoFunction

public class HEC_IsoFunction
extends HEC_Creator

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte, W:Blut Straightforward marching cube implementation: http://local.wasp.uwa.edu.au/~pbourke/geometry/polygonise/ IsoFunction expects a 3D function instead of a 3D array of values.
